import React from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; import ReactStars from "react-rating-stars-component"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faComment, faThumbsUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import ProductReviewContent from './ProductReviewContent'; export default function ProductReview(props) { const defaultStar = { size: 24, value: 0, activeColor: "#fda32a", color: "#ddd", isHalf: true, edit: true } const product = props.product; console.log(product) return(
{props.setTab(0)}}> Description
{props.setTab(1)}}> Reviews {product.productVote.length}
{ props.tabId === 0 &&
{product.productDes}
} { props.tabId === 1 &&

{item.name}
{item.ratingDate}
{item.ratingImg.map((item, index) => { return ( ) })}
) })}
